title: Beyond Conventional Batteries: A Review on Semi-Solid and Redox Targeting Flow Batteries-LiFePO4 as a Case Study
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00064A, Review Article
Nabil El Halya, Marwa Tayoury, Mohamed Aqil, Abedelhay Aboulaich, Rachid Amine, Fouad Ghamouss, Mohammed Makha, Jones Alami, Mouad Dahbi
Clean and sustainable energy is becoming increasingly crucial to tackle the current energy crisis. However, the intermittent nature of renewable energy sources presents a challenge for their effective implementation. Redox...
